SEARCH
Package spaceInvaders.Model

Class GameModel

java.lang.Object
spaceInvaders.Model.GameModel
All Implemented Interfaces:
IGameModel
public class GameModel extends Object implements IGameModel
GameModel class implements the IGameModel interface and is responsible for managing the state of the Space Invaders game. It keeps track of game entities like the player, enemy, bullets, and stars, and handles the logic for updating their states. The class also manages the game's screen dimensions and initializes the starting positions of the player and enemy.
Version:
1.0
Author:
MD Amanullah

      private volatile boolean running
      Flag to control the running state of the starUpdateThread.

    • lastPlayerShotTime

      private long lastPlayerShotTime
      Timestamp of the last shot fired by the player. This is used to implement a cooldown mechanism, ensuring that there is a delay between consecutive shots fired by the player. The time is stored in milliseconds.

    • lastEnemyShotTime

      private long lastEnemyShotTime
      Timestamp of the last shot fired by the enemy. Similar to lastPlayerShotTime, this field is used to enforce a delay between consecutive shots fired by the enemy. The time is stored in milliseconds.

  • Constructor Details

    • GameModel

      public GameModel()
      Constructor for GameModel. Initializes the game by setting up the player, enemy, bullets, and the star update thread.

  • Method Details

    • movePlayer

      public void movePlayer(int dx, int dy)
      Moves the player character based on the given deltas in x and y direction.
      Specified by:
      movePlayer in interface IGameModel
      Parameters:
      dx - Delta for the x-axis movement.
      dy - Delta for the y-axis movement.

    • moveEnemy

      Specified by:
      moveEnemy in interface IGameModel
      Parameters:
      dx - Delta for the x-axis movement.
      dy - Delta for the y-axis movement.

    • shootBullet

      public void shootBullet()
      Shoots a bullet from the player's position. The bullet is added to the bullet list.
      Specified by:
      shootBullet in interface IGameModel

    • shootEnemyBullet

      public void shootEnemyBullet()
      Shoots a bullet from the enemy's position. The enemy bullet is added to the enemy bullet list.
      Specified by:
      shootEnemyBullet in interface IGameModel

    • updateBullets

      private void updateBullets()
      Updates the status of all player bullets. It moves the bullets, checks for collisions, removes off-screen bullets, and updates the game state if the enemy is defeated.

    • updateEnemyBullets

      private void updateEnemyBullets()
      Updates the status of all enemy bullets. It moves the bullets, checks for collisions, removes off-screen bullets, and updates the game state if the player is defeated.

    • handleBulletEnemyCollision

      private boolean handleBulletEnemyCollision(Bullet bullet)
      Handles the collision between a player bullet and the enemy. It decreases the enemy's lives and increases the player's score.
      Parameters:
      bullet - The bullet that hit the enemy.
      Returns:
      true to indicate the bullet should be removed.

    • handleBulletStarCollision

      private boolean handleBulletStarCollision(Bullet bullet)
      Handles the collision between any bullet and the star. It increases the player's lives when a player bullet hits the star, or the enemy's lives when an enemy bullet hits the star.
      Parameters:
      bullet - The bullet that hit the star.
      Returns:
      true to indicate the bullet should be removed.

    • checkCollision

      private boolean checkCollision(Bullet bullet, Enemy enemy)
      Checks if a bullet has collided with the enemy.
      Parameters:
      bullet - The bullet to check for collision.
      enemy - The enemy to check for collision with.
      Returns:
      true if the bullet has collided with the enemy, false otherwise.

    • checkCollision

      private boolean checkCollision(Bullet bullet, Star star)
      Checks if a bullet has collided with the star.
      Parameters:
      bullet - The bullet to check for collision.
      star - The star to check for collision with.
      Returns:
      true if the bullet has collided with the star, false otherwise.

    • handleBulletPlayerCollision

      private boolean handleBulletPlayerCollision(EnemyBullet bullet)
      Handles the collision between an enemy bullet and the player. It decreases the player's lives and increases the enemy's score.
      Parameters:
      bullet - The bullet that hit the player.
      Returns:
      true to indicate the bullet should be removed.

    • handleBulletStarCollision

      private boolean handleBulletStarCollision(EnemyBullet bullet)
      Handles the collision between an enemy bullet and the star. It increases the enemy's lives when an enemy bullet hits the star.
      Parameters:
      bullet - The bullet that hit the star.
      Returns:
      true to indicate the bullet should be removed.

    • checkCollision

      private boolean checkCollision(EnemyBullet bullet, Player player)
      Checks if an enemy bullet has collided with the player.
      Parameters:
      bullet - The enemy bullet to check for collision.
      player - The player to check for collision with.
      Returns:
      true if the enemy bullet has collided with the player, false otherwise.

    • checkCollision

      private boolean checkCollision(EnemyBullet bullet, Star star)
      Checks if an enemy bullet has collided with the star.
      Parameters:
      bullet - The enemy bullet to check for collision.
      star - The star to check for collision with.
      Returns:
      true if the enemy bullet has collided with the star, false otherwise.

    • startStarUpdateThread

      private void startStarUpdateThread()
      Starts a thread responsible for updating the appearance of the star at regular intervals. The star's appearance changes every 10 seconds.

    • updateStar

      private void updateStar()
      Updates the position of the star and its existence status based on time intervals.

    • updateGame

      public void updateGame()
      Updates the game state including bullets, enemy bullets, and the star. Checks for game over conditions.
      Specified by:
      updateGame in interface IGameModel

    • resetGame

      public void resetGame()
      Resets the game state to the initial state with the player, enemy, and empty bullet lists.
      Specified by:
      resetGame in interface IGameModel
